name: Territorial Attack
description:
Protect your castle by throwing projectiles on the invading enemies. Use amazing power-ups as the level advances. There is some twist in each level, like a new power-up, different enemies, and much more. Test your shooting skills on different enemies. You will definitely end up making some strategy to defeat those enemies. Throwing objects include balls, shoes, etc, because our player is not a murderer XD.

Drag near the player to set the direction and power to throw and release to shoot the projectile.
Defeat enemies, earn coins, use power-ups, buy projectiles from the shop, and most importantly save your territory.

FEATURES:
Laser tracer, shield, hammer, and health potion as Power-ups, tutorial, shop, and fluent gameplay.

Made as a part of a project under GameDev, IITK
Developers - Team Hawkeyes:
